item.title: How do I add Npcs and objects to a 517?
item.dc:creator: @Beastly_Pvp Beastly Pvp
item.description:
@Beastly_Pvp wrote:

Hello I need help in adding npcs and objects to my 517 source, I have been searching my source for a while and can’t figure out how. I also have teamviewer if you need to look on my server files. Help plz thx

why wont this work? I want that to spawn object id 2213 at xcoord 2353 and ycoord 3165. Btw this is in actionsender.java.

public void createGlobalObject(int objectId, int height, int objectX, int objectY, int face, int type) { for (Player p : Engine.players) { if (p == null) { continue; } createObject(p, 2213, 0, 2353, 3165, 2, 10); } }

Oh and also i don’t know what’s wrong with my ::tele command, I don’t get any compiler errors but I can’t use it.

if (cmd[0].equals("tele")) { int x = Integer.parseInt(cmd[1]); int y = Integer.parseInt(cmd[2]); int h = Integer.parseInt(cmd[3]); p.teleportTo(x, y, h, 4, 0, 8939, 8941, 1576, 0, 1577, 0); } if (cmd[0].equals("sound")) { p.getActionSender().addSoundEffect(p, Integer.parseInt(cmd[1]), 1, 0, 0); } if (cmd[0].equals("overlay")) { p.getActionSender().setOverlay(p, Integer.parseInt(cmd[1])); }

Read full topic
item.source: How do I add Npcs and objects to a 517?
